PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The URL to redirect the user to after authentication, the Access Token will be provided in the GET parameter as 'access_token', this is only for Applications with the 'Redirect' authentication method.
When set to True or 1, the Authentication Prompt's UI will be expanded and there will be no background animations, this is optimal for pop-up windows.

When set to True or 1, the Window will close after the user authenticates if it can and display a message telling the user that they can close the Window after they authenticate. This is ideal if you cannot programmatically close the Window either by Software or JavaScript
